name: fat_proc_convert_dcm_anat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Converts an anatomical dataset from DICOM files into a volume, specifically designed to fit in line with other processing such as DTI analysis.

inputs.description: Input as DICOM directory; DIR_IN should contain only DICOM files; all will be selected.
inputs.name: DICOM Directory

inputs.description: Input as NIFTI file (zipped or unzipped fine). Alternative to '-indir ..'.
inputs.name: NIFTI Input

inputs.description: Set prefix (and path) for output data.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default name = '__WORKING_convert_dcm_anat').
inputs.name: Working Directory

inputs.description: Optional chance to reset orientation of the volume files (default is currently 'RAI').
inputs.name: Orientation

inputs.description: Turns off the nicety of putting (0, 0, 0) at brain's center of mass (-> 'reorigin' calc) and reorienting data (-> 'reorient' calc).
inputs.name: Reorient/Reorigin Off Flag

inputs.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files separately (default is '').
inputs.name: QC Prefix

inputs.description: Don't save the command line call and the location where it was run.
inputs.name: No Command Output Flag

inputs.description: Turn off generating QC image files.
inputs.name: No QC View Flag
